nodes.text: Larbo Nelik was a female Podracer who lived during the last decades of the Galactic Republic. Sometime before 32 BBY, Nelik participated in a Podrace on the planet Tatooine. During the race, Nelik had a massive crash and was killed.

Nelik was first mentioned in The Clone Wars: Wild Space, a novel written by Karen Miller and published in 2008. Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker compared the crash which resulted in Nelik's death to the injuries of Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, who was gravely wounded during a bomb attack in the novel.
